overview: A young woman returns home from an internship in Israel to find that her parents have arranged her to be married to a wealthy business man. Quick thinking and the help of her best friend from college allow her to escape the throws of marital servitude to a complete stranger and to start a new life in the City of Freedom. With her parents constantly on the hunt for her, she must live a life of secrecy. In San Francisco, she finds not only herself, but true love along the way.
title: The Arrangement
